articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Landing and Anti-landing Drills of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Landing and Anti-landing Drills of KPA
Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), guided landing and anti-landing exercises of the KPA.
					 Involved in the drills were surface ships and sharpshooters of the East Sea Fleet of the KPA Navy, pursuit planes under the 2nd Air Division of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, artillery sub-units of the 7th Corps and some forces of the 108th Motorized Infantry Division of the KPA.
					
					 After receiving a report on the drill procedures from the chief of the KPA General Staff at an observation post, the Supreme Commander gave an order to start the drills.
					
					 A landing drill was staged first.
					
					 Seeing the daring action of landing units, Kim Jong Un said with pleasure that such surprise landing and attack on the coast would result in a victorious battle.
					
					 Then followed an anti-landing drill.
					
					 Artillerymen are very skilled in shooting, the Supreme Commander said, adding: Any enemy group will never land in seashore of the country as our reliable artillerymen stand guard in full readiness to wipe out the aggressors.
					
					 He expressed his great satisfaction over the successful drills and set forth the tasks for rounding off the KPA's combat readiness under the prevailing situation.
					
					 The victory of an amphibious battle depends mainly on how to neutralize the enemy's possible anti-landing movements while getting over its coastal defenses at one go, he said, stressing the need to elaborate on the workable combat operations in this regard and ratchet up the practical drills for getting familiar with them and improve the armament on the navy's surface ships.
					
					 He said that, in order to bury at sea any enemy groups attacking to land in the coast of the country, training should be intensified among the units and sub-units of the KPA with the Juche-based idea and tactics on the coastal defence newly set forth by the Party.
					
					 Watching the drills were commanders of KPA corps and instructors of military academies at all levels.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Iranian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Iranian President
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Hassan Rouhani, president of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on its New Year.
					 The message sincerely wished the president and people of Iran bigger successes in their work for the country's progress and development, hoping the DPRK-Iran friendly and cooperative relations will grow strong in various fields such as politics, economy and culture.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Greets to Iranian FM
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Greets to Iranian FM
DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Sunday sent a message of greeting to his Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif on the New Year of Iran.
					 Expressing the belief that the contact and visit, exchange and cooperation between the two foreign ministries would expand and the bilateral relations grow stronger, the message wished the Iranian foreign minister good health and bigger success in his work.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Tunisia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Tunisia
Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Al Beji Caid Essebssi, president of the Republic of Tunisia, on its 60th national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the Tunisian president bigger success in his work for the country's social stability and economic development.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Tunisian PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Tunisian PM
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Habib Essid, prime minister of the Republic of Tunisia, on the occasion of its 60th national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the Tunisian people steady prosperity and well-being.
					
					 On the same day DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to his Tunisian counterpart Khemaies Jhinaoui.

articles.title: DPRK Women Footballers Win Title of Int'l Soccer Matches
articles.content:
DPRK Women Footballers Win Title of Int'l Soccer Matches
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team won the title of 2016 U-19 International Women's Soccer "Spring of Kuban" which was held in Sochi, Russia from March 10 to 19.
					 The matches brought together 8 teams from the DPRK, Russia, Iran, Romania and other countries and regions.
					
					 The DPRK team trounced the Krasnodar territorial team and Siberia team of Russia, Estonian team 4:0, 5:1 and 6:0 in group league matches.
					
					 It beat its Romanian rival 2:0 in the semi-final.
					
					 The DPRK team won the title by defeating its Russian rival 2:0 in the final on March 19.

articles.title: Land for Cultivating Soybean to Be Increased in DPRK
articles.content:
Land for Cultivating Soybean to Be Increased in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The cultivation of soybean has been encouraged in the DPRK as part of the efforts to improve people's diet.
					 This year, over 10 000 hectares will be added to the area for soybean cultivation.
					
					 High-yielding soybean varieties were secured and the work to increase the fertility of soil is going on in rural areas across the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, proper measures have been taken to supply farm machines and farming materials for soybean farming and rearrange irrigation system.
					
					 This year will witness a hot emulation for soybean farming among all the co-op farms throughout the country.
					
					 Soybean is native to Korea.

articles.title: Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex Boosts Production
articles.content:
Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex Boosts Production
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex in the DPRK has increased production in the ongoing 70-day campaign.
					 The complex overfulfilled the daily production plan of Juche iron 190 percent on March 1, 196 percent on March 10 and 213 percent on March 11.
					
					 The complex recently set up oxygen heat-based production process with indigenous technologies, thus making big strides in putting the production processes on Juche and modern basis.
					
					 As the process is entirely based on locally available raw materials and fuel, it is possible to sharply increase iron and steel production.
					
					 Technical innovations also play important role in boosting the production at the complex.
					
					 The complex is now pushing ahead with the establishment of a coal-dressing process as well as the project to apply high-temperature air-combustion technology.

articles.title: Invincible KPA Air Force
articles.content:
Invincible KPA Air Force
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The dark cloud of a war hangs over the Korean Peninsula due to the reckless war drills staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group against the DPRK, but the airspace above it will always remain clear and blue.
					 The clear and blue sky over the country would have been unthinkable without the immortal feats performed by the peerlessly great persons in founding and developing the air force of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 After the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, President Kim Il Sung declared the birth of the Juche-oriented air force in his historic speech "Let Us Create the Air Force of the New Korea".
					
					 In mid-March Juche 35 (1946), he saw to it that an aviation class was organized at the Pyongyang Institute and formed the first air corps in 1947.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), the heroic KPA air force achieved such great feats as shooting down a number of "B-29"s, the so-called "flying fortress", and dashing a burning plane into a U.S. war vessel to sink it in the sea off Inchon, humbling the pride of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 In 1952 alone, they brought down and damaged hundreds of enemy planes.
					
					 The Korean people still remember the great feats performed by the KPA air force in shooting down the U.S. spying plane "EC-121", which intruded deep into the DPRK's airspace, in 1960s and driving "RC-135" away in 2003.
					
					 In the period of Songun (military-first) leadership, leader Kim Jong Il paid ceaseless visits to KPA air units and sub-units in order to develop the KPA air force into an elite force equipped with ever-victorious strategy and tactics, bold offensive spirit and actual war capability.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, convened the meeting of airpersons of the KPA for the first time in the history of KPA building.
					
					 Now the KPA air force, armed with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the spirit of acting as human bullets and bombs, is now awaiting the order of the supreme commander.

articles.title: Such Traitors as Park Geun Hye Should Be Buried as Early as Possible: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Such Traitors as Park Geun Hye Should Be Buried as Early as Possible: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye at a "state council meeting" on March 15 reeled off a tirade about the "provocative speech", "reckless threat" and "full preparations". She also shouted herself hoarse about someone's "self-destruction", blustering that "she can never overlook 'human rights issue'" of someone.
					 At a meeting of chiefs of diplomatic and consular missions abroad held on the previous day, she made a string of such provocative remarks against the DPRK as "tyrannical rule."
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says that what she uttered is nothing but grumbles made by the witch, taken aback by the DPRK's successive actions of taking the toughest counteractions against the U.S. and hostile forces' extremely harsh sanctions and daily-increasing military threats to the DPRK.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Decades have passed since Chongwadae appeared and its bosses have been replaced several times. But it has never hosted such a cruel and dreadful confrontation maniac and rare fascist dictator as Park Geun Hye.
					
					 An ignorant person is bound to become an evil one.
					
					 The same was case with Lee Myung Bak whose intelligence quotient is "2MB" for which the people censured and the same is true of Park Geun Hye who has never been delivered of a baby.
					
					 The future of the south Korean people is getting gloomier and all Koreans have failed to get rid of the pain resulting from the national division due to such betes noires.
					
					 The Korean nation can be free from the danger of a nuclear war and reunification will come earlier only when such hordes of traitors as Park Geun Hye are buried in graves as soon as possible.

articles.title: U.S. Is Not Safe Haven for Aggressors, Provocateurs: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Not Safe Haven for Aggressors, Provocateurs: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. mainland is not the safe haven for the worst aggressors and provocateurs, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has had access to nuclear miniaturization and technology of ballistic rocket atmospheric re-entry to put a definite end to the maneuvers of the arrogant aggressors, brigandish warmongers who are wielding nuclear weapons.
					
					 In addition to this, the new large-caliber multiple rocket launcher of the DPRK, which the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea and south Korean puppet forces term "more dangerous than missile," clearly proves the matchless power of independent defence industry as the Juche-based weapon in the era of the dignified Workers' Party.
					
					 The new anti-tank guided rocket system of the DPRK is another Juche-based weapon of Korean style capable of fully overpowering the enemies' numerical and technological advantages.
					
					 The DPRK could manufacture latest strategic weapons and H-bomb terrifying the enemies despite the hostile forces' unprecedented moves to isolate and stifle it because it is holding up the banner of the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and self-development, true to the strategic intention of our great party.
					
					 Trusting the soldiers who are true to the intention and will of the Party Central Committee, the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu declared the plan to conduct nuclear warhead explosion test and test-fire of different type ballistic rockets capable of carrying nuclear warhead in a short period to increase the reliability of the nuclear attack capability of Juche Korea.
					
					 This is the decisive counteraction mode of the great Paektusan nation to mercilessly meet the reckless and aggressive challenge of the hostile forces.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Had Better Worry about Guns of Puppet Army Soldiers: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Had Better Worry about Guns of Puppet Army Soldiers: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Recent suicide, desertion from barracks and shooting spree are occurring one after another in the south Korean puppet army and military drafting evasion has become a serious social problem.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this is an inevitable product of the corrupt gangster-style barrack culture in which soldiers are regarded as cannon fodder for invading the north and they are trained by dint of club discipline and rude violence.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the Park Geun Hye group of traitors is raising a hue and cry over the "punishment" and "preemptive attack" on someone by mobilizing the puppet army, no more than scarecrows.
					
					 The south Korean puppet army can never be a match of the Korean People's Army as it is no more than a colonial mercenary army of the U.S. and an extremely degenerated and corrupt rabble.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces which the puppet forces regard as savior are no more than fallen leaves in autumn in face of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 It is a foolish act for the officers and men of the puppet army to blindly follow the Park group going reckless to provoke a war against the north.
					
					 The puppet army soldiers would be well advised to drop guns and seek a way out if they do not want to die a dog's death in face of merciless strike of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces and to escape punishment as traitors like Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The Park group had better worry about guns of the puppet army soldiers which may be leveled at it at any time, before going mad with the war maneuvers for invading the north.

articles.title: Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Can Never Be Denied: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Can Never Be Denied: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- When the UN high commissioner for Human Rights referred to the surviving victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army as survivors of the sexual slavery when making an annual report, the Japanese representative refuted his assertion by saying that "the sexual slavery is contrary to the fact".
					 When the high commissioner said the "agreement" on sexual slavery reached at the end of last year between Japan and south Korea sparked criticism among former sexual slaves, the Japanese representative replied that "'the agreement' meant the final and irreversible solution".
					
					 The next day the Japanese chief Cabinet secretary at a press conference grumbled that the suspicion about "agreement" on sexual slavery between Japan and south Korea raised by the UN high commissioner was quite different from what the international community thought and it was greatly regrettable.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says that the ulterior motive of Japan is to prevent the issue of sexual slavery from being taken up for discussion on the international arena at any cost and push under the carpet the hideous past crimes.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric Japan may use, it can never cover up the thrice-cursed crimes it committed by enforcing state-sponsored sexual slavery, abducting 200,000 Korean women and ruthlessly violating their chastity, dignity and rights.
					
					 The commentary urges Japan to make proper apology and sincere reparation for its past crimes as soon as possible, not working hard to deny and distort them.

articles.title: Young S. Korean Jobless Rate Reaches All-time High
articles.content:
Young S. Korean Jobless Rate Reaches All-time High
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on March 17 carried an editorial titled "Jobless rate among youth hits all-time high, symbol of policy incompetence".
					 The editorial said the jobless rate among youth marked a record high in February. It went on:
					
					 In particular, young people in their 20s suffer from poor employment.
					
					 The unemployment crisis among youth has worsened under the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The editorial urged the regime not to shift the responsibility for the crisis on to others but to change policy that does nothing to relieve youth of their pain.

articles.title: S. Koreans Hold Candlelight Rally for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Koreans Hold Candlelight Rally for Peace against War
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of different social standings held a candlelight action in Seoul on March 16 denouncing the puppet forces' war drills against the north, according to the south Korean internet news Tongil News.
					 The participants said they could not understand the regime vociferating about "war", urging the regime to understand it can do nothing with confrontation.
					
					 They warned that the present regime resorting to the war maneuvers after shutting down the Kaesong Industrial Zone will be made to pay dearly.
					
					 All Koreans hope to see peace, not war, they said, declaring that they would continue the candlelight action for peace against war.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo on March 19 in an editorial denounced the south Korean conservative regime for intentionally blocking the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The editorial said though 700 days passed since the occurrence of the Sewol disaster, nothing has been probed.
					
					 A special law has not been adopted in spite of the hard struggle of the bereaved families of the disaster, it said, noting that the reality reminds people of the saying "one trying to cover up something is the criminal."
					
					 The people's life is always in danger as long as there is the Park Geun Hye regime making even the bereaved families undergo greater pain, not content with leaving more than 300 people on the seabed, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 It is urgent to put an end to the cursed reality driving the people's living into the same disaster as ferry Sewol sinking.

articles.title: Works of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Posted by Int'l Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Works of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un Posted by Int'l Body on Its Website
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" were posted by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on its website One Korea Network on March 13.
					 The work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" published on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), lays bare the reactionary nature and absurdity of sophistry of the imperialists and renegades of socialism slandering socialism as "totalitarian", "barrack-like" and "administrative and commanding."
					
					 It also clarifies the principled issues arising in defending and accomplishing the cause of socialism including the issues of regarding socialism as faith, putting it on a moral basis and giving full play to its advantages.
					
					 The work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" published on Feb. 25, 2014 says that the whole road covered by the Korean revolution was the history of the ideological campaign for giving fullest play to the might of truth of the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates the present tasks and ways to be fulfilled in the party ideological work.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 10.
					 Eko Suryo Santjojo, general chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee fixed the celebration period from March 15 and April 15 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Romania
Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 14 under the sponsorship of the New Socialist Party of Romania.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania and chairman of the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a seminar, lecture, photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events from March 21 to April 15.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Kuwait
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Kuwait on March 10.
					 Javid Ahmad, director of the Administrative Department of the Times Publishing House who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from March 10 to April 16 and decided to give publicity to articles praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and organize a seminar, lecture, film show and other colorful political and cultural events.
					
					 It also decided to conduct positive activities to support the stand of the DPRK as regards the prevailing situation on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Thailand
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Thailand
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A Thai preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed on March 11.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the above-said occasions.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Guinea
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Korean book and photo exhibition and film show took place at the Kimilsungia Hothouse of Guinea on March 14 to celebrate President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venue were books introducing his exploits and photos dealing with Kimilsungia festivals and exhibitions held in the DPRK, Guinea and other countries.
					
					 The Korean film "Kimilsungia" was screened at the film show.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association of Guinea in a speech praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader who performed great exploits for the people's happiness, country's prosperity and global independence.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung is boundlessly revered by humankind for the exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 Kimilsungia, a flower which was bred to praise the great man, reflecting all people's reverence for him, is in full bloom not only in Guinea but in different countries.

articles.title: Int'l Body Slashes at U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Int'l Body Slashes at U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The International League of People's Struggle made public a statement on March 13 in denunciation of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 Accusing the drills for invading the DPRK, the statement extended support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for defending sovereignty, justice and peace.
					
					 Referring to the scale and danger of the drills and introducing the statement of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the statement said:
					
					 The DPRK and its people have the right to launch a preemptive strike at the aggressors.
					
					 The KPA General Staff solemnly declared its will to mercilessly eliminate all those involved in the "operation for advancing into Pyongyang" and blow up all their plot-breeding bases.
					
					 The International League of People's Struggle called on all its affiliated organizations to criticize the joint military drills.
					
					 It also called for dismissing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces as arch criminals aggravating the situation on the Korean peninsula and threatening regional peace.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Condemned by British Organizations
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Condemned by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on March 14 in protest against the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces' joint military exercises.
					 Terming U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 war drills aimed to "bring down the social system" of the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 Such military drills can by no means be overlooked as they were kicked off when the U.S. and its followers railroaded the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK through the UN and are escalating their moves to stifle it.
					
					 The drills are bringing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 Stop all war drills on the Korean peninsula at once!
					
					 Korea is one!
					
					 We oppose the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK!

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de desembarco y anti-desembarco de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de desembarco y anti-desembarco de EPC
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios de desembarco y anti-desembarco del EPC.
					En el entrenamiento tomaron parte los buques de guerra y francotiradores de la flota del Mar Este de Corea de las fuerzas maritimas del EPC, los cazas de la division aerea No. 2 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, las subunidades artilleras del cuerpo de ejercito No. 7 del EPC y una parte de la division de la infanteria motorizada No. 108 del EPC.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, el Mariscal escucho un informe sobre el plan de operacion por parte del jefe de Estado Mayor General del EPC y dio la orden de iniciarlos.
					
					Primero, hubo los ejercicios de desembarco.
					
					Viendo las valientes acciones combativas de las unidades de desembarco, el Mariscal se mostro satisfecho diciendo que pueden concluir triunfalmente el combate si se desembarcan asi de manera sorpresiva en la costa y se pasan al ataque.
					
					Acto seguido, se realizo el entrenamiento de defensa contra el desembarco.
					
					El Comandante Supremo subrayo que los artilleros disparan bien los canones y agrego que por contar con tales artilleros fidedignos y bien dispuestos, nuestra costa no permitira en absoluto el desembarco de cualquier colectivo enemigo.
					
					Mostro una gran satisfaccion por la exitosa realizacion de los ejercicios y presento las tareas que se presentan para perfeccionar mas los preparativos de combate del EPC conforme a la demanda de la situacion creada.
					
					Acoto que la victoria o derrota del combate de desembarco dependen en mayor grado de las operaciones de superar con prontitud las instalaciones de defensa costera de los enemigos y controlar las reacciones de los enemigos tendentes a frenar el desembarco de nuestro ejercito.
					
					Y destaco la necesidad de preparar de manera detallada y real los planes operacionales y combativos relativos a esto, intensificar los ejercicios practicos para adiestrarlos y mejorar los armamentos de los buques de guerra de las fuerzas maritimas.
					
					Enfatizo que para sepultar en el mar todos los colectivos de desembarco de los enemigos que atacan nuestra costa hay que entrenar sin cesar las unidades y subunidades de acuerdo con los requisitos de la idea de los metodos de combate originales presentados de nuevo por nuestro partido en materia de la defensa costera.
					
					Vieron los ejercicios los jefes de los cuerpos de ejercito y los profesores de las academias militares a todos niveles.
